name: Curse of the Snowgod
description:
This is a local co-op RPG for 1-4 players.

Made for the FFSJam in one month. There's not a lot in the game, in fact only two quests are in the game for the FFSJam release. However, this is just a very early "alpha" release, and the development will continue.

I post regular updates on twitter, and I'll start a dev blog soon after the jam.

Have fun, it's what games are for! :)
